articles.title: TCS layoffs: US techies allege Indian IT major of employment discrimination - The Economic Times
articles.description: According to a report in the Wall Street Journal, more than 20 employees have filed complaints against TCS, alleging preferential treatment towards individuals on H-1B visas.
articles.content: A group of tech professionals working with TCS in the US have accused the IT major of employment discrimination. They alleged that TCS terminated their employment on brief notice and replaced many of… [+3516 chars]

articles.title: Microsoft knows you love tricking its AI chatbots into doing weird stuff and it's designing 'prompt shields' to stop you - Fortune
articles.description: “These jailbreaks ... are an inherent weakness of the model technology,” says Sarah Bird, Microsoft’s chief product officer of responsible AI.
articles.content: Microsoft Corp. is trying to make it harder for people to trick artificial intelligence chatbots into doing weird things. New safety features are being built into Azure AI Studio which lets developer… [+1946 chars]
